wanderingMiniBosses:RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, TOUCH #b

wanderingMiniBosses:GazeOne.NAME: Gaze of the closing Eyes
DESCRIPTIONS: After playing the first card each turn its adjacent cards cost #b

wanderingMiniBosses:GazeTwo.NAME: Gaze of the empty Mind
DESCRIPTIONS: The second card you play each turn is
replaced with a random #pCurse this combat.

wanderingMiniBosses:GazeThree.NAME: Gaze of the reborn Heart
DESCRIPTIONS: After playing the third card each turn,
shuffle a random card from your starterdeck into your discard pile.
